content: while you re here please check out my patterns of the week and save 50% off and more http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials i love these dusters but the refills are so expensive this one works up really fast and is simple to make then just throw it in the wash with your other cloths and it will be ready for the next cleaning project description skill level basic crochet skills are needed and must be able to read a crochet pattern completion time how long it takes the designer to make one 1 5 hours materials and details yarn cotton note some people have made these with acrylic yarn and sprayed with dust cleaner hook h measurement before folding under ends 14 5 x 5 if you enjoy this freebie i hope you will check out my premium patterns 1 to ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ please follow snappy tots on your favorites social media sites for giveaways new release announcements events and fun facebook 2 pinterest 3 instagram 4 twitter 5 check out the rest of my shop for almost 500 patterns shop now 6 if you have any questions comments or suggestions please send me an email 7 1 http //shop snappy-tots com 2 https //www facebook com/snappytots 3 https //www pinterest com/snappytots/ 4 https //www instagram com/snappytots/ 5 https //twitter com/snappytots 6 http //shop snappy-tots com 7 mailto heidi@snappy-tots com
